title: The Music of AHS 1984 Theory Video
author: MaryGirl Moody
comment: Definitely music will include The Police, Flock of Seagulls, Culture Club, Cyndi Lauper, Thompson Twins, Bananarama, Tina Turner, Spandau Ballet, The Motels, Quiet Riot, Loverboy, Michael Jackson, Madonna, ABC, Human League, WHAM!, Pat Benatar, Laura Branigan, The Go-Go's, The Cars, Hall & Oats, The Pretenders, ect

I was born in 1992 but I absolutely love 80's music because my Mom used to listen to it all the time. There's one soundtrack related thing I can picture if say all the girls were staying in one cabin, a scene where one of them plays "Girl's Just Want to Have Fun" and they have a dance party or something and they have to convince this stick in the mud character to get off of her bed and join in the fun. Then the camera pans out from their cabin, the music fading, to reveal the killer standing in the trees listening and watching.
Loving the new end credits Mary 😊
I think the music will be from '83 and the FIRST HALF of '84. The season takes place in the summer.
description:
Let's theorize the soundtrack for #AHS1984
